title: How India’s Plan of Democratizing Public Services Will Guide Other Countries
desc: A breakdown of how UPI, ONDC, Aadhaar and ABHA form a model of open digital infrastructure.

title: Democratization of India’s Hardware, Manufacturing & Bio Labs Public Infrastructure for the Next Generation Entrepreneurs
desc: India’s next leap will come from democratizing machine-tool labs, CNC facilities, furnaces, 3D-printing, and public bio-labs — enabling a new generation of inventors and product creators.
